workflow.title: Our Workflow - AI CNC
workflow.description: Learn about our AI-powered CNC manufacturing process from design to delivery
workflow.heading: Our Manufacturing Process
workflow.subheading: A step-by-step journey from design to delivery, enhanced by AI technology

one.title: Design Upload & AI Analysis
one.description: Upload your CAD files or 3D models for our AI to analyze. Our system will identify optimization opportunities for manufacturing efficiency and cost reduction.

two.title: Material Selection & Quotation
two.description: Choose from our range of high-quality materials. Our AI system will calculate precise costs and delivery timelines based on your design and material choice.

three.title: AI-Optimized Tool Pathing
three.description: Our proprietary AI algorithms generate optimal tool paths for CNC machining, minimizing waste while maximizing precision and efficiency.

four.title: Precision Manufacturing
four.description: Your parts are produced on our state-of-the-art CNC machines with real-time AI monitoring to ensure exceptional accuracy and quality.

five.title: Quality Control & Delivery
five.description: Every part undergoes rigorous AI-assisted quality inspection before being carefully packaged and shipped to your specified location.

cta.title: Ready to Experience AI-Powered Manufacturing?
cta.description: Start your project today and see how our AI technology can transform your manufacturing process.
